publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2539# Mr Duncan McNeil: Research into Cancer Levels in the Semiconductor Industryâ€”That the Parliament notes the publication Cancer Among Current and Previous Workers at National Semiconductor (UK) Ltd, Greenock: Results of an investigation by the Health and Safety Executive; further notes that the study gives cause for concern which can only be addressed through further research across the semiconductor industry; believes that steps should be taken to ensure that GPs and other health professionals are well briefed and prepared for any enquiries from concerned current or former members of the workforce, and further believes that Ministers and officials of the Scottish Executive should work in partnership with all those concerned to ensure that issues arising from this research are addressed as a matter of priority.
S1M-2539# Research into Cancer Levels in the Semiconductor Industry (lodged on 11 December 2001) Marilyn Livingstone*, Trish Godman*
S1M-2539# Research into Cancer Levels in the Semiconductor Industry (lodged on 11 December 2001) Tommy Sheridan*, Alex Neil*

S1M-2539# Mr Duncan McNeil: Research into Cancer Levels in the Semiconductor Industry-That the Parliament notes the publication Cancer Among Current and Previous Workers at National Semiconductor (UK) Ltd, Greenock: Results of an investigation by the Health and Safety Executive; further notes that the study gives cause for concern which can only be addressed through further research across the semiconductor industry; believes that steps should be taken to ensure that GPs and other health professionals are well briefed and prepared for any enquiries from concerned current or former members of the workforce, and further believes that Ministers and officials of the Scottish Executive should work in partnership with all those concerned to ensure that issues arising from this research are addressed as a matter of priority. Supported by: Marilyn Livingstone, Trish Godman, Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil
S1M-2539# Research into Cancer Levels in the Semiconductor Industry (lodged on 11 December 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-2539# Research into Cancer Levels in the Semiconductor Industry (lodged on 11 December 2001) Tricia Marwick*, Johann Lamont*, Pauline McNeill*

S1M-2539# Research into Cancer Levels in the Semiconductor Industry (lodged on 11 December 2001) Brian Adam*
S1M-2539# Research into Cancer Levels in the Semiconductor Industry (lodged on 11 December 2001) Cathy Peattie*, Maureen Macmillan*, Rhoda Grant*
S1M-2539# Research into Cancer Levels in the Semiconductor Industry (lodged on 11 December 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
